content: Also, @Dan Gottlieb as a follow up - we implicitly sorted the empty return, right? there's no empty return at the end of processing now...
@Grahame Grieve My vote is fhir+ndjson, since we're returning valid FHIR resources - what's the arguement in the other direction?
Also, I think the consensus was to return the json object with an empty output array if there are no results
the argument in the other direction is (a) that's what we said first (b) that's the default mime type for nd-json, and (c) +xml and +json are registered but +ndjson is not.
